get_mirca2000_data

Source: R/pkg_utils.R
get_mirca2000_data.Rd

get_mirca2000_data

Usage

get_mirca2000_data(
  download_url =
    "https://zenodo.org/records/7422506/files/harvested_area_grids.zip?download=1",
  file_extension = "zip",
  data_dir = file.path(getwd(), "example")
)

Arguments

download_url

Link to the downloadable dataset

file_extension

String of file extension without "."

data_dir

Path of desired location to download data
